aboutpara: I began my career as an architectural designer, developing a strong eye for detail and user-centered thinking. Seeking greater impact, I transitioned to UX design at Trip.com, a leading global travel platform based in Shanghai.

I love designing digital experiences that look great and just make senseâ€”even when the problem is complex. When Iâ€™m not working, youâ€™ll find me exploring new spots, listening to pop, traveling, or hunting for my next favorite meal.
